  53# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  54# --- class ImageWidgetView(QWidget) -------------------------------------------------------
  55# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  56class ImageWidgetView(QWidget):
  57    """description of class"""
  58
  59    def __init__(self,controller,colorData = None):
  60        super().__init__()
  61        self.controller = controller
  62        self.label = QLabel(self)   # create a QtLabel for pixmap
  63        if not isinstance(colorData, np.ndarray): colorData = ImageWidgetView.emptyImageColorData()
  64        # self.colorData = colorData  # image content attributes           
  65        self.setPixmap(colorData)  
  66
  67    def resize(self):
  68        self.label.resize(self.size())
  69        self.label.setPixmap(self.imagePixmap.scaled(self.size(),Qt.KeepAspectRatio))
  70
  71    def resizeEvent(self,event):
  72        self.resize()
  73        super().resizeEvent(event)
  74
  75    def setPixmap(self,colorData):
  76        if not isinstance(colorData, np.ndarray): 
  77            colorData = ImageWidgetView.emptyImageColorData()
  78        # self.colorData = colorData
  79        height, width, channel = colorData.shape   # compute pixmap
  80        bytesPerLine = channel * width
  81        # clip
  82        colorData[colorData>1.0] = 1.0
  83        colorData[colorData<0.0] = 0.0
  84
  85        qImg = QImage((colorData*255).astype(np.uint8), width, height, bytesPerLine, QImage.Format_RGB888) # QImage
  86        self.imagePixmap = QPixmap.fromImage(qImg)
  87        self.resize()
  88
  89        return self.imagePixmap
  90
  91    def setQPixmap(self, qPixmap):
  92        self.imagePixmap = qPixmap
  93        self.resize()
  94
  95    def emptyImageColorData(): return np.ones((90,160,3))*(220/255) 
  96# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  97# --- class FigureWidget(FigureCanvas ------------------------------------------------------
  98# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  99class FigureWidget(FigureCanvas):
 100    """ Matplotlib Figure Widget  """
 101
 102    def __init__(self, parent=None, width=5, height=5, dpi=100):
 103        # create Figure
 104        self.fig = Figure(figsize=(width, height), dpi=dpi)
 105        self.axes = self.fig.add_subplot(111)
 106        FigureCanvas.__init__(self, self.fig)    # explicite call of super constructor
 107        self.setParent(parent)
 108        FigureCanvas.updateGeometry(self)
 109        self.setMinimumSize(200, 200)
 110
 111    def plot(self,X,Y,mode, clear=False):
 112        if clear: self.axes.clear()
 113        self.axes.plot(X,Y,mode)
 114        try:
 115            self.fig.canvas.draw()
 116        except Exception:
 117            time.sleep(0.5)
 118            self.fig.canvas.draw()
 119
 120# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 121# --- class ImageGalleryView(QSplitter) ----------------------------------------------------
 122# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 123class ImageGalleryView(QSplitter):
 124    """ 
 125        ImageGallery(QSplitter)
 126
 127        +-------------------------------------------+
 128        | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ | \
 129        | |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |  |
 130        | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |  |
 131        | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |  |
 132        | |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |  |
 133        | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |  |
 134        | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |   >   GridLayout
 135        | |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |  |
 136        | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |  |
 137        | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |  |
 138        | |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |  |
 139        | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ | /
 140        +-------------------------------------------+  <    splitter
 141        | [<] [1x1][3x2][6x4][9x6][page number] [>] |       [pushButton] HorizontalLayout
 142        +-------------------------------------------+
 143
 144    """
 145    def __init__(self,controller_=None,shapeMode=None):
 146        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.__init__(",")")
 147
 148        super().__init__(Qt.Vertical)
 149
 150        self.controller= controller_
 151        self.shapeMode = controller.GalleryMode._3x2 if not shapeMode else shapeMode    # default display mode 
 152        self.pageNumber =0
 153
 154        self.imagesControllers = []
 155
 156        self.images = QFrame()
 157        self.images.setFrameShape(QFrame.StyledPanel)
 158        self.imagesLayout = QGridLayout()
 159        self.images.setLayout(self.imagesLayout)
 160
 161        self.buildGridLayoutWidgets()
 162
 163        self.previousPageButton =   QPushButton('<')
 164        self.previousPageButton.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_previousPage)
 165        self._1x1Button =           QPushButton('1x1')
 166        self._1x1Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_1x1)
 167        self._2x1Button =           QPushButton('2x1')
 168        self._2x1Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_2x1)
 169        self._3x2Button =           QPushButton('3x2')
 170        self._3x2Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_3x2)
 171        self._6x4Button =           QPushButton('6x4')
 172        self._6x4Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_6x4)
 173        self._9x6Button =           QPushButton('9x6')
 174        self._9x6Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_9x6)
 175        self.nextPageButton =       QPushButton('>')
 176        self.nextPageButton.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_nextPage)
 177
 178        self.pageNumberLabel = QLabel(str(self.pageNumber)+"/ ...")
 179
 180        self.buttons = QWidget()
 181        self.buttonsLayout = QHBoxLayout()
 182        self.buttons.setLayout(self.buttonsLayout)
 183        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self.previousPageButton)
 184        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._1x1Button)
 185        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._2x1Button)
 186        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._3x2Button)
 187        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._6x4Button)
 188        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._9x6Button)
 189        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self.nextPageButton)
 190
 191        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self.pageNumberLabel)
 192
 193        self.addWidget(self.images)
 194        self.addWidget(self.buttons)
 195        self.setSizes([1525,82])
 196
 197    def currentPage(self): return self.pageNumber
 198
 199    def changePageNumber(self,step):
 200        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.changePageNumber(",step,")")
 201
 202        nbImagePerPage = controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode)*controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)
 203        maxPage = ((len(self.controller.model.processPipes)-1)//nbImagePerPage) + 1
 204
 205        if len(self.controller.model.processPipes) > 0 :
 206
 207            oldPageNumber = self.pageNumber
 208            if (self.pageNumber+step) > maxPage-1:
 209                self.pageNumber = 0
 210            elif (self.pageNumber+step) <0:
 211                self.pageNumber = maxPage-1
 212            else:
 213                self.pageNumber  = self.pageNumber+step
 214            self.updateImages()
 215            self.controller.model.loadPage(self.pageNumber)
 216            if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.changePageNumber(currentPage:",self.pageNumber," | max page:",maxPage,")")
 217
 218    def updateImages(self):
 219        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.updateImages(",")")
 220
 221        """ update images content """
 222        nbImagePerPage = controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode)*controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)
 223        maxPage = ((len(self.controller.model.processPipes)-1)//nbImagePerPage) + 1
 224        
 225        index=0
 226        for i in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode)): 
 227            for j in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)):
 228                # get image controllers                                                                                         
 229                iwc = self.imagesControllers[index]
 230                iwc.view.setPixmap(ImageWidgetView.emptyImageColorData())                                                 
 231                index +=1                                                                                                                                                                                                           
 232        self.pageNumberLabel.setText(str(self.pageNumber)+"/"+str(maxPage-1))
 233
 234    def updateImage(self, idx, processPipe, filename):
 235        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.updateImage(",")")
 236        imageWidgetController = self.imagesControllers[idx]                                 
 237        imageWidgetController.setImage(processPipe.getImage())
 238        self.controller.parent.statusBar().showMessage("loading of image "+filename+" done!")
 239
 240    def resetGridLayoutWidgets(self):
 241        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.resetGridLayoutWidgets(",")")
 242
 243        for w in self.imagesControllers:
 244            self.imagesLayout.removeWidget(w.view)
 245            w.view.deleteLater()
 246        self.imagesControllers = []
 247
 248    def buildGridLayoutWidgets(self):
 249        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.buildGridLayoutWidgets(",")")
 250
 251        imageIndex = 0
 252        for i in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode)): 
 253            for j in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)):
 254                iwc = controller.ImageWidgetController(id=imageIndex)
 255                self.imagesControllers.append(iwc)
 256                self.imagesLayout.addWidget(iwc.view,i,j)
 257                imageIndex +=1
 258
 259    def wheelEvent(self, event):
 260        if pref.verbose: print(" [EVENT] >> ImageGalleryView.wheelEvent(",")")
 261
 262        if event.angleDelta().y() < 0 :     
 263            self.changePageNumber(+1)
 264            if self.shapeMode == controller.GalleryMode._1x1 : 
 265                self.controller.selectImage(0)
 266
 267        else :                              
 268            self.changePageNumber(-1)
 269            if self.shapeMode == controller.GalleryMode._1x1 : 
 270                self.controller.selectImage(0)
 271        event.accept()
 272
 273    def mousePressEvent(self,event):
 274        if pref.verbose: print(" [EVENT] >> ImageGalleryView.mousePressEvent(",")")
 275
 276        # self.childAt(event.pos()) return QLabel .parent() should be ImageWidget object
 277        if isinstance(self.childAt(event.pos()).parent(),ImageWidgetView):
 278            id = self.childAt(event.pos()).parent().controller.id()
 279        else:
 280            id = -1
 281
 282        if id != -1: # an image is clicked select it!
 283            self.controller.selectImage(id)
 284        event.accept()
 285# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 286# --- class AppView(QMainWindow) -----------------------------------------------------------
 287# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 288class AppView(QMainWindow):
 289    """ 
 290        MainWindow(Vue)
 291    """
 292    def __init__(self, _controller = None, shapeMode=None, HDRcontroller=None):
 293        super().__init__()
 294        # --------------------
 295        scale = 0.8
 296        # --------------------   
 297        # attributes
 298        self.controller = _controller
 299        self.setWindowGeometry(scale=scale)
 300        self.setWindowTitle('uHDR - Rmi Cozot (c) 2020-2021')      # title  
 301        self.statusBar().showMessage('Welcome to uHDR!')         # status bar
 302
 303        self.topContainer = QWidget()
 304        self.topLayout = QHBoxLayout()
 305
 306        self.imageGalleryController = controller.ImageGalleryController(self)
 307
 308        self.topLayout.addWidget(self.imageGalleryController.view)
 309
 310        self.topContainer.setLayout(self.topLayout)
 311        self.setCentralWidget(self.topContainer)
 312        # ----------------------------------
 313        self.dock = controller.MultiDockController(self, HDRcontroller)
 314        self.addDockWidget(Qt.RightDockWidgetArea,self.dock.view)
 315        self.resizeDocks([self.dock.view],[int(self.controller.screenSize[0].width()*scale//4)],Qt.Horizontal)
 316
 317        # ----------------------------------
 318        # build menu
 319        self.buildFileMenu()
 320        self.buildDockMenu()
 321        self.buildDisplayHDR()
 322        self.buildExport()
 323        self.buildPreferences()
 324    # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 325    def getImageGalleryController(self): return self.imageGalleryController
 326    # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 327    def resizeEvent(self, event): super().resizeEvent(event)
 328    # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 329    def setWindowGeometry(self, scale=0.8):
 330        displayCoord = QDesktopWidget().screenGeometry(1)
 331        if len(self.controller.screenSize) > 1:
 332            width, height = self.controller.screenSize[1].width(), self.controller.screenSize[1].height()
 333        else:
 334            width, height = self.controller.screenSize[0].width(), self.controller.screenSize[0].height()
 335
 336        self.setGeometry(displayCoord.left(), displayCoord.top()+50, math.floor(width*scale), math.floor(height*scale))
 337        self.showMaximized()
 338    # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 339    def buildFileMenu(self):
 340        menubar = self.menuBar()# get menubar
 341        fileMenu = menubar.addMenu('&File')# file menu
 342
 343        selectDir = QAction('&Select directory', self)        
 344        selectDir.setShortcut('Ctrl+O')
 345        selectDir.setStatusTip('[File] select a directory')
 346        selectDir.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackSelectDir)
 347        fileMenu.addAction(selectDir)
 348
 349        selectSave = QAction('&Save', self)        
 350        selectSave.setShortcut('Ctrl+S')
 351        selectSave.setStatusTip('[File] saving processpipe metadata')
 352        selectSave.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackSave)
 353        fileMenu.addAction(selectSave)
 354
 355        quit = QAction('&Quit', self)        
 356        quit.setShortcut('Ctrl+Q')
 357        quit.setStatusTip('[File] saving updates and quit')
 358        quit.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackQuit)
 359        fileMenu.addAction(quit)
 360    # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------    
 361    def buildPreferences(self):
 362        """build preferences menu
 363
 364            Args:
 365
 366            Returns:
 367
 368        """
 369
 370        menubar = self.menuBar()# get menubar
 371        prefMenu = menubar.addMenu('&Preferences')# file menu
 372
 373        displayList = pref.getHDRdisplays().keys()
 374
 375        # function for callback
 376        def cbd(tag): 
 377            pref.setHDRdisplay(tag)
 378            self.statusBar().showMessage("swithcing HDR Display to: "+tag+"!")
 379            self.menuExport.setText('&Export to '+pref.getHDRdisplay()['tag'])
 380            self.menuExportAll.setText('&Export All to '+pref.getHDRdisplay()['tag'])        
 381
 382        prefDisplays = []
 383        for i,d in enumerate(displayList):
 384            if d != 'none':
 385                prefDisplay = QAction('&Set display to '+d, self) 
 386                p_cbd = functools.partial(cbd, d)
 387                prefDisplay.triggered.connect(p_cbd)
 388                prefMenu.addAction(prefDisplay)
 389
 390    # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 391    def buildDisplayHDR(self):
 392        menubar = self.menuBar()# get menubar
 393        displayHDRmenu = menubar.addMenu('&Display HDR')# file menu
 394
 395        displayHDR = QAction('&Display HDR image', self)        
 396        displayHDR.setShortcut('Ctrl+H')
 397        displayHDR.setStatusTip('[Display HDR] display HDR image')
 398        displayHDR.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackDisplayHDR)
 399        displayHDRmenu.addAction(displayHDR)
 400        # ------------------------------------
 401        displayHDR = QAction('&Compare raw and edited HDR image', self)        
 402        displayHDR.setShortcut('Ctrl+C')
 403        displayHDR.setStatusTip('[Display HDR] compare raw HDR image and edited one')
 404        displayHDR.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackCompareRawEditedHDR)
 405        displayHDRmenu.addAction(displayHDR)
 406        # ------------------------------------
 407        closeHDR = QAction('&reset HDR display', self)        
 408        closeHDR.setShortcut('Ctrl+K')
 409        closeHDR.setStatusTip('[Display HDR] reset HDR window')
 410        closeHDR.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackCloseDisplayHDR)
 411        displayHDRmenu.addAction(closeHDR)
 412    # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  
 413    def buildExport(self):
 414        menubar = self.menuBar()# get menubar
 415        exportHDR = menubar.addMenu('&Export HDR image')# file menu
 416
 417        self.menuExport = QAction('&Export to '+pref.getHDRdisplay()['tag'], self)        
 418        self.menuExport.setShortcut('Ctrl+X')
 419        self.menuExport.setStatusTip('[Export HDR image] save HDR image file for HDR display')
 420        self.menuExport.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackExportHDR)
 421        exportHDR.addAction(self.menuExport)
 422
 423        self.menuExportAll = QAction('&Export All to '+pref.getHDRdisplay()['tag'], self)        
 424        self.menuExportAll.setShortcut('Ctrl+Y')
 425        self.menuExportAll.setStatusTip('[Export all HDR images] save HDR image files for HDR display.')
 426        self.menuExportAll.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackExportAllHDR)
 427        exportHDR.addAction(self.menuExportAll)
 428    # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------        
 429    def buildDockMenu(self):
 430        menubar = self.menuBar()# get menubar
 431        dockMenu = menubar.addMenu('&Dock')# file menu
 432
 433        info = QAction('&Info. and Metadata', self)        
 434        info.setShortcut('Ctrl+I')
 435        info.setStatusTip('[Dock] image information dock')
 436        info.triggered.connect(self.dock.activateINFO)
 437        dockMenu.addAction(info)
 438
 439        edit = QAction('&Edit', self)        
 440        edit.setShortcut('Ctrl+E')
 441        edit.setStatusTip('[Dock] image editing dock')
 442        edit.triggered.connect(self.dock.activateEDIT)
 443        dockMenu.addAction(edit)
 444
 445        iqa = QAction('&Image Aesthetics', self)        
 446        iqa.setShortcut('Ctrl+A')
 447        iqa.setStatusTip('[Dock] image aesthetics dock')
 448        iqa.triggered.connect(self.dock.activateMIAM)
 449        dockMenu.addAction(iqa)
 450    # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 451    def closeEvent(self, event):
 452        if pref.verbose: print(" [CB] >> AppView.closeEvent()>> ... closing")
 453        self.imageGalleryController.save()
 454        self.controller.hdrDisplay.close()

 456# --- class ImageInfoView(QSplitter) -------------------------------------------------------
 457# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 458class ImageInfoView(QSplitter):
 459    def __init__(self, _controller):
 460        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageInfoView.__init__(",")")
 461
 462        super().__init__(Qt.Vertical)
 463
 464        self.controller = _controller
 465
 466        self.imageWidgetController = controller.ImageWidgetController()
 467
 468        self.layout = QFormLayout()
 469
 470        # ---------------------------------------------------
 471        self.imageName =            AdvanceLineEdit(" name:", " ........ ",             self.layout, callBack=None)
 472        self.imagePath =            AdvanceLineEdit(" path:", " ........ ",             self.layout, callBack=None)
 473        self.imageSize =            AdvanceLineEdit(" size (pixel):", ".... x .... ",   self.layout, callBack=None)
 474        self.imageDynamicRange =    AdvanceLineEdit(" dynamic range (f-stops)", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
 475        self.colorSpace =           AdvanceLineEdit(" color space:", " ........ ",      self.layout, callBack=None)
 476        self.imageType =            AdvanceLineEdit(" type:", " ........ ",             self.layout, callBack=None)                     
 477        self.imageBPS =             AdvanceLineEdit(" bits per sample:", " ........ ",  self.layout, callBack=None)
 478        self.imageExpoTime =        AdvanceLineEdit(" exposure time:", " ........ ",    self.layout, callBack=None)
 479        self.imageFNumber =         AdvanceLineEdit("f-number:", " ........ ",          self.layout, callBack=None)          
 480        self.imageISO =             AdvanceLineEdit(" ISO:", " ........ ",              self.layout, callBack=None)           
 481        self.imageCamera =          AdvanceLineEdit(" camera:", " ........ ",           self.layout, callBack=None)      
 482        self.imageSoftware =        AdvanceLineEdit(" software:", " ........ ",         self.layout, callBack=None)      
 483        self.imageLens =            AdvanceLineEdit(" lens:", " ........ ",             self.layout, callBack=None)
 484        self.imageFocalLength =     AdvanceLineEdit(" focal length:", " ........ ",     self.layout, callBack=None)
 485        # ---------------------------------------------------
 486        # ---------------------------------------------------
 487        line = QFrame()
 488        line.setFrameShape(QFrame.HLine)
 489        self.layout.addRow(line)
 490        # ---------------------------------------------------
 491        #  user defined tags
 492        # --------------------------------------------------
 493        userDefinedTags = hdrCore.metadata.tags()
 494        tagRootName = userDefinedTags.getTagsRootName()
 495        listOfTags = userDefinedTags.tags[tagRootName]
 496        self.userDefinedTags = []
 497        for tagGroup in listOfTags:
 498            groupKey = list(tagGroup.keys())[0]
 499            tagLeafs = tagGroup[groupKey]
 500            for tag in tagLeafs.items():
 501                self.userDefinedTags.append( AdvanceCheckBox(self,groupKey, tag[0], False, self.layout))
 502            line = QFrame()
 503            line.setFrameShape(QFrame.HLine)
 504            self.layout.addRow(line)
 505        # --------------------------------------------------
 506
 507
 508        self.layout.setSizeConstraint(QLayout.SetMinAndMaxSize)
 509
 510        self.scroll = QScrollArea()
 511        self.scroll.setVerticalScrollBarPolicy(Qt.ScrollBarAlwaysOn)
 512        self.container = QLabel()
 513        self.container.setLayout(self.layout)
 514        self.scroll.setWidget(self.container)
 515        self.scroll.setWidgetResizable(True)
 516
 517        self.addWidget(self.imageWidgetController.view)
 518        self.addWidget(self.scroll)
 519        self.setSizes([60,40])
 520
 521    def setProcessPipe(self,processPipe): 
 522        image_ = processPipe.getImage()
 523        # ---------------------------------------------------
 524        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageInfoView.setImage(",image_.name,")")
 525        if image_.metadata.metadata['filename'] != None: self.imageName.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['filename'])
 526        else: self.imageName.setText(" ........ ")
 527        if image_.metadata.metadata['path'] != None: self.imagePath.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['path'])
 528        else: self.imagePath.setText(" ........ ")
 529        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Image Width'] != None: self.imageSize.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Image Width'])+" x "+ str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Image Height']))
 530        else: self.imageSize.setText(" ........ ")
 531        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Dynamic Range (stops)'] != None: self.imageDynamicRange.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Dynamic Range (stops)']))
 532        else: self.imageDynamicRange.setText(" ........ ")
 533        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Color Space'] != None: self.colorSpace.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Color Space'])
 534        else: self.imageName.setText(" ........ ")
 535        if image_.type != None: self.imageType.setText(str(image_.type))       
 536        else: self.colorSpace.setText(" ........ ")
 537        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Bits Per Sample'] != None: self.imageBPS.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Bits Per Sample']))
 538        else: self.imageBPS.setText(" ........ ")
 539        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Exposure Time'] != None: self.imageExpoTime.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Exposure Time'][0])+" / " + str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Exposure Time'][1]))
 540        else: self.imageExpoTime.setText(" ........ ")
 541        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['F Number'] != None: self.imageFNumber.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['F Number'][0]))    
 542        else: self.imageFNumber.setText(" ........ ")
 543        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['ISO'] != None: self.imageISO.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['ISO']))       
 544        else: self.imageISO.setText(" ........ ")
 545        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Camera'] != None: self.imageCamera.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Camera'])      
 546        else: self.imageCamera.setText(" ........ ")
 547        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Software'] != None: self.imageSoftware.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Software'])      
 548        else: self.imageSoftware.setText(" ........ ")
 549        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Lens'] != None: self.imageLens.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Lens'])
 550        else: self.imageLens.setText(" ........ ")
 551        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Focal Length'] != None: self.imageFocalLength.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Focal Length'][0]))
 552        else: self.imageFocalLength.setText(" ........ ")
 553        # ---------------------------------------------------
 554        self.controller.callBackActive = False
 555        # ---------------------------------------------------
 556        tagRootName = image_.metadata.otherTags.getTagsRootName()
 557        listOfTags = image_.metadata.metadata[tagRootName]
 558
 559        for i,tagGroup in enumerate(listOfTags):
 560            groupKey = list(tagGroup.keys())[0]
 561            tagLeafs = tagGroup[groupKey]
 562            for tag in tagLeafs.items():
 563                # find advanced checkbox
 564                for acb in self.userDefinedTags:
 565                    if (acb.rightText ==tag[0] ) and (acb.leftText== groupKey):
 566                        on_off = image_.metadata.metadata[tagRootName][i][groupKey][tag[0]]
 567                        on_off = on_off if on_off else False
 568                        acb.setState(on_off)
 569                        break  
 570        # ---------------------------------------------------        
 571        self.controller.callBackActive = True
 572        # ---------------------------------------------------
 573        return self.imageWidgetController.setImage(image_)
 574
 575    def metadataChange(self,metaGroup,metaTag, on_off): 
 576        if self.controller.callBackActive: self.controller.metadataChange(metaGroup,metaTag, on_off)

 578# --- class AdvanceLineEdit(object) --------------------------------------------------------
 579# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 580class AdvanceLineEdit(object):
 581    def __init__(self, labelName, defaultText, layout, callBack=None):
 582        self.label = QLabel(labelName)
 583        self.lineEdit =QLineEdit(defaultText)
 584        if callBack: self.lineEdit.textChanged.connect(callBack)
 585        layout.addRow(self.label,self.lineEdit)
 586
 587    def setText(self, txt): self.lineEdit.setText(txt)

 589# --- class AdvanceCheckBox(object) --------------------------------------------------------
 590# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 591class AdvanceCheckBox(object):
 592    def __init__(self, parent, leftText, rightText, defaultValue, layout):
 593        self.parent = parent
 594
 595        self.leftText = leftText
 596        self.rightText = rightText
 597
 598        self.label = QLabel(leftText)
 599        self.checkbox =QCheckBox(rightText)
 600        self.checkbox.toggled.connect(self.toggled)
 601        layout.addRow(self.label,self.checkbox)
 602
 603    def setState(self, on_off): self.checkbox.setChecked(on_off)
 604
 605    def toggled(self): self.parent.metadataChange(self.leftText, self.rightText, self.checkbox.isChecked())

 741 
 742    def setProcessPipe(self, processPipe):
 743        """ 
 744            called to initialize EditImageView on image change
 745            recover parameters of processPipe
 746            and initialize view components
 747        """
 748        if pref.verbose:  print(" [VIEW] >> EditImageView.setProcessPipe(",")")
 749
 750        # exposure
 751        # recover value in pipe and restore it
 752        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("exposure")
 753        value = processPipe.getParameters(id)
 754        self.exposure.setValue(value['EV'], callBackActive = False)
 755
 756        # contrast
 757        # recover value in pipe and restore it
 758        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("contrast")
 759        value = processPipe.getParameters(id)
 760        self.contrast.setValue(value['contrast'], callBackActive = False)
 761
 762        # tonecurve
 763        # recover data in pipe and restore it
 764        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("tonecurve")
 765        value = processPipe.getParameters(id)
 766        self.tonecurve.setValues(value,callBackActive = False)
 767
 768        # lightnessmask
 769        # recover data in pipe and restore it
 770        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("lightnessmask")
 771        value = processPipe.getParameters(id)
 772        self.lightnessmask.setValues(value,callBackActive = False)
 773
 774        # saturation
 775        # recover data in pipe and restore it
 776        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("saturation")
 777        value = processPipe.getParameters(id)
 778        self.saturation.setValue(value['saturation'], callBackActive = False)
 779
 780        # colorEditor0
 781        # recover data in pipe and restore it
 782        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("colorEditor0")
 783        values = processPipe.getParameters(id)
 784        self.colorEditor0.setValues(values, callBackActive = False)
 785
 786        # colorEditor1
 787        # recover data in pipe and restore it
 788        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("colorEditor1")
 789        values = processPipe.getParameters(id)
 790        self.colorEditor1.setValues(values, callBackActive = False)
 791
 792        # colorEditor2
 793        # recover data in pipe and restore it
 794        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("colorEditor2")
 795        values = processPipe.getParameters(id)
 796        self.colorEditor2.setValues(values, callBackActive = False)
 797
 798        # colorEditor3
 799        # recover data in pipe and restore it
 800        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("colorEditor3")
 801        values = processPipe.getParameters(id)
 802        self.colorEditor3.setValues(values, callBackActive = False)
 803        
 804        # colorEditor4
 805        # recover data in pipe and restore it
 806        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("colorEditor4")
 807        values = processPipe.getParameters(id)
 808        self.colorEditor4.setValues(values, callBackActive = False)
 809        
 810        # geometry
 811        # recover data in pipe and restore it
 812        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("geometry")
 813        values = processPipe.getParameters(id)
 814        self.geometry.setValues(values, callBackActive = False)

 816# --- class MultiDockView(QDockWidget) -----------------------------------------------------
 817# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 818class MultiDockView(QDockWidget):
 819    def __init__(self, _controller, HDRcontroller=None):
 820        if pref.verbose:  print(" [VIEW] >> MultiDockView.__init__(",")")
 821
 822        super().__init__("Image Edit/Info")
 823        self.controller = _controller
 824
 825        self.setAllowedAreas(Qt.LeftDockWidgetArea | Qt.RightDockWidgetArea)
 826      
 827        self.childControllers = [
 828            controller.EditImageController(self, HDRcontroller), 
 829            controller.ImageInfoController(self), 
 830            controller.ImageAestheticsController(self)]
 831            #controller.ImageQualityController(self, HDRcontroller)]
 832        self.childController = self.childControllers[0]
 833        self.active = 0
 834        self.setWidget(self.childController.view)
 835        self.repaint()
 836    # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 837    def switch(self,nb):
 838        """
 839            change active dock
 840            nb = 0 > editing imag dock
 841            nb = 1 > image info and metadata dock
 842            nb = 2 > image aesthetics model 
 843        """
 844        if pref.verbose:  print(" [VIEW] >> MultiDockView.switch(",nb,")")
 845
 846        if nb != self.active:
 847     
 848            self.active = (nb)%len(self.childControllers)
 849            self.childController.view.deleteLater()
 850            self.childController = self.childControllers[self.active]
 851            # rebuild view 
 852            processPipe = self.controller.parent.imageGalleryController.getSelectedProcessPipe()
 853            self.childController.buildView(processPipe)
 854            self.setWidget(self.childController.view)
 855            self.repaint()
 856    # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 857    def setProcessPipe(self, processPipe):
 858        if pref.verbose:  print(" [VIEW] >> MultiDockView.setProcessPipe(",processPipe.getImage().name,")")
 859        return self.childController.setProcessPipe(processPipe)

 865class AdvanceSliderView(QFrame):
 866    def __init__(self, controller, name,defaultValue, range, step):

 869        self.controller = controller

 876

 878        self.auto = QPushButton("auto")
 879        self.editValue = QLineEdit()
 880        self.editValue.setValidator(QDoubleValidator())
 881        self.editValue.setText(str(defaultValue))
 882        self.reset = QPushButton("reset")
 883
 884        self.hbox.addWidget(self.label)
 885        self.hbox.addWidget(self.auto)
 886        self.hbox.addWidget(self.editValue)
 887        self.hbox.addWidget(self.reset)
 888
 889        self.slider = QSlider(Qt.Horizontal)
 890        self.slider.setRange(int(range[0]/step),int(range[1]/step))
 891        self.slider.setValue(int(defaultValue/step))
 892        self.slider.setSingleStep(1) 
 893
 894        self.vbox.addWidget(self.firstrow)
 895        self.vbox.addWidget(self.slider)
 896
 897        self.setLayout(self.vbox)
 898
 899        # callBackFunctions slider/reset/auto
 900        self.slider.valueChanged.connect(self.controller.sliderChange)
 901        self.reset.clicked.connect(self.controller.reset)
 902        self.auto.clicked.connect(self.controller.auto)

1377    def sliderHueChange(self):
1378        hmin = self.sliderHueMin.value()
1379        hmax = self.sliderHueMax.value()
1380
1381        # redraw hue range and chroma bar
1382        hueRangeBarLch = hdrCore.image.Image.buildLchColorData((75,75), (100,100), (hmin,hmax), (20,720), width='h', height='c')
1383        hueRangeBarRGB = hdrCore.processing.Lch_to_sRGB(hueRangeBarLch,apply_cctf_encoding=True, clip=True)
1384        self.imageHueRangeController.setImage(hueRangeBarRGB)
1385        saturationBarLch = hdrCore.image.Image.buildLchColorData((75,75), (0,100), (hmin,hmax), (20,720), width='c', height='L')
1386        saturationBarRGB = hdrCore.processing.Lch_to_sRGB(saturationBarLch,apply_cctf_encoding=True, clip=True)
1387        self.imageSaturationController.setImage(saturationBarRGB)
1388
1389        # call controller
1390        self.controller.sliderHueChange(hmin,hmax)
1391

1393        vmin = self.sliderChromaMin.value()
1394        vmax = self.sliderChromaMax.value()
1395        # call controller
1396        self.controller.sliderChromaChange(vmin,vmax)

1400        vmax = self.sliderLightMax.value()/3.0

class ImageWidgetView(PyQt5.QtWidgets.QWidget): 
57class ImageWidgetView(QWidget):
58    """description of class"""
59
60    def __init__(self,controller,colorData = None):
61        super().__init__()
62        self.controller = controller
63        self.label = QLabel(self)   # create a QtLabel for pixmap
64        if not isinstance(colorData, np.ndarray): colorData = ImageWidgetView.emptyImageColorData()
65        # self.colorData = colorData  # image content attributes           
66        self.setPixmap(colorData)  
67
68    def resize(self):
69        self.label.resize(self.size())
70        self.label.setPixmap(self.imagePixmap.scaled(self.size(),Qt.KeepAspectRatio))
71
72    def resizeEvent(self,event):
73        self.resize()
74        super().resizeEvent(event)
75
76    def setPixmap(self,colorData):
77        if not isinstance(colorData, np.ndarray): 
78            colorData = ImageWidgetView.emptyImageColorData()
79        # self.colorData = colorData
80        height, width, channel = colorData.shape   # compute pixmap
81        bytesPerLine = channel * width
82        # clip
83        colorData[colorData>1.0] = 1.0
84        colorData[colorData<0.0] = 0.0
85
86        qImg = QImage((colorData*255).astype(np.uint8), width, height, bytesPerLine, QImage.Format_RGB888) # QImage
87        self.imagePixmap = QPixmap.fromImage(qImg)
88        self.resize()
89
90        return self.imagePixmap
91
92    def setQPixmap(self, qPixmap):
93        self.imagePixmap = qPixmap
94        self.resize()
95
96    def emptyImageColorData(): return np.ones((90,160,3))*(220/255)

class FigureWidget(matplotlib.backends.backend_qtagg.FigureCanvasQTAgg): 
100class FigureWidget(FigureCanvas):
101    """ Matplotlib Figure Widget  """
102
103    def __init__(self, parent=None, width=5, height=5, dpi=100):
104        # create Figure
105        self.fig = Figure(figsize=(width, height), dpi=dpi)
106        self.axes = self.fig.add_subplot(111)
107        FigureCanvas.__init__(self, self.fig)    # explicite call of super constructor
108        self.setParent(parent)
109        FigureCanvas.updateGeometry(self)
110        self.setMinimumSize(200, 200)
111
112    def plot(self,X,Y,mode, clear=False):
113        if clear: self.axes.clear()
114        self.axes.plot(X,Y,mode)
115        try:
116            self.fig.canvas.draw()
117        except Exception:
118            time.sleep(0.5)
119            self.fig.canvas.draw()

class ImageGalleryView(PyQt5.QtWidgets.QSplitter): 
124class ImageGalleryView(QSplitter):
125    """ 
126        ImageGallery(QSplitter)
127
128        +-------------------------------------------+
129        | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ | \
130        | |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |  |
131        | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |  |
132        | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |  |
133        | |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |  |
134        | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |  |
135        | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |   >   GridLayout
136        | |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |  |
137        | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |  |
138        | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |  |
139        | |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |  |
140        | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ | /
141        +-------------------------------------------+  <    splitter
142        | [<] [1x1][3x2][6x4][9x6][page number] [>] |       [pushButton] HorizontalLayout
143        +-------------------------------------------+
144
145    """
146    def __init__(self,controller_=None,shapeMode=None):
147        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.__init__(",")")
148
149        super().__init__(Qt.Vertical)
150
151        self.controller= controller_
152        self.shapeMode = controller.GalleryMode._3x2 if not shapeMode else shapeMode    # default display mode 
153        self.pageNumber =0
154
155        self.imagesControllers = []
156
157        self.images = QFrame()
158        self.images.setFrameShape(QFrame.StyledPanel)
159        self.imagesLayout = QGridLayout()
160        self.images.setLayout(self.imagesLayout)
161
162        self.buildGridLayoutWidgets()
163
164        self.previousPageButton =   QPushButton('<')
165        self.previousPageButton.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_previousPage)
166        self._1x1Button =           QPushButton('1x1')
167        self._1x1Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_1x1)
168        self._2x1Button =           QPushButton('2x1')
169        self._2x1Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_2x1)
170        self._3x2Button =           QPushButton('3x2')
171        self._3x2Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_3x2)
172        self._6x4Button =           QPushButton('6x4')
173        self._6x4Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_6x4)
174        self._9x6Button =           QPushButton('9x6')
175        self._9x6Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_9x6)
176        self.nextPageButton =       QPushButton('>')
177        self.nextPageButton.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_nextPage)
178
179        self.pageNumberLabel = QLabel(str(self.pageNumber)+"/ ...")
180
181        self.buttons = QWidget()
182        self.buttonsLayout = QHBoxLayout()
183        self.buttons.setLayout(self.buttonsLayout)
184        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self.previousPageButton)
185        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._1x1Button)
186        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._2x1Button)
187        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._3x2Button)
188        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._6x4Button)
189        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._9x6Button)
190        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self.nextPageButton)
191
192        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self.pageNumberLabel)
193
194        self.addWidget(self.images)
195        self.addWidget(self.buttons)
196        self.setSizes([1525,82])
197
198    def currentPage(self): return self.pageNumber
199
200    def changePageNumber(self,step):
201        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.changePageNumber(",step,")")
202
203        nbImagePerPage = controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode)*controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)
204        maxPage = ((len(self.controller.model.processPipes)-1)//nbImagePerPage) + 1
205
206        if len(self.controller.model.processPipes) > 0 :
207
208            oldPageNumber = self.pageNumber
209            if (self.pageNumber+step) > maxPage-1:
210                self.pageNumber = 0
211            elif (self.pageNumber+step) <0:
212                self.pageNumber = maxPage-1
213            else:
214                self.pageNumber  = self.pageNumber+step
215            self.updateImages()
216            self.controller.model.loadPage(self.pageNumber)
217            if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.changePageNumber(currentPage:",self.pageNumber," | max page:",maxPage,")")
218
219    def updateImages(self):
220        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.updateImages(",")")
221
222        """ update images content """
223        nbImagePerPage = controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode)*controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)
224        maxPage = ((len(self.controller.model.processPipes)-1)//nbImagePerPage) + 1
225        
226        index=0
227        for i in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode)): 
228            for j in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)):
229                # get image controllers                                                                                         
230                iwc = self.imagesControllers[index]
231                iwc.view.setPixmap(ImageWidgetView.emptyImageColorData())                                                 
232                index +=1                                                                                                                                                                                                           
233        self.pageNumberLabel.setText(str(self.pageNumber)+"/"+str(maxPage-1))
234
235    def updateImage(self, idx, processPipe, filename):
236        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.updateImage(",")")
237        imageWidgetController = self.imagesControllers[idx]                                 
238        imageWidgetController.setImage(processPipe.getImage())
239        self.controller.parent.statusBar().showMessage("loading of image "+filename+" done!")
240
241    def resetGridLayoutWidgets(self):
242        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.resetGridLayoutWidgets(",")")
243
244        for w in self.imagesControllers:
245            self.imagesLayout.removeWidget(w.view)
246            w.view.deleteLater()
247        self.imagesControllers = []
248
249    def buildGridLayoutWidgets(self):
250        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.buildGridLayoutWidgets(",")")
251
252        imageIndex = 0
253        for i in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode)): 
254            for j in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)):
255                iwc = controller.ImageWidgetController(id=imageIndex)
256                self.imagesControllers.append(iwc)
257                self.imagesLayout.addWidget(iwc.view,i,j)
258                imageIndex +=1
259
260    def wheelEvent(self, event):
261        if pref.verbose: print(" [EVENT] >> ImageGalleryView.wheelEvent(",")")
262
263        if event.angleDelta().y() < 0 :     
264            self.changePageNumber(+1)
265            if self.shapeMode == controller.GalleryMode._1x1 : 
266                self.controller.selectImage(0)
267
268        else :                              
269            self.changePageNumber(-1)
270            if self.shapeMode == controller.GalleryMode._1x1 : 
271                self.controller.selectImage(0)
272        event.accept()
273
274    def mousePressEvent(self,event):
275        if pref.verbose: print(" [EVENT] >> ImageGalleryView.mousePressEvent(",")")
276
277        # self.childAt(event.pos()) return QLabel .parent() should be ImageWidget object
278        if isinstance(self.childAt(event.pos()).parent(),ImageWidgetView):
279            id = self.childAt(event.pos()).parent().controller.id()
280        else:
281            id = -1
282
283        if id != -1: # an image is clicked select it!
284            self.controller.selectImage(id)
285        event.accept()

334        else:

362    def buildPreferences(self):
363        """build preferences menu
364
365            Args:
366
367            Returns:
368
369        """
370

372        prefMenu = menubar.addMenu('&Preferences')# file menu
373
374        displayList = pref.getHDRdisplays().keys()
375
376        # function for callback
377        def cbd(tag): 
378            pref.setHDRdisplay(tag)
379            self.statusBar().showMessage("swithcing HDR Display to: "+tag+"!")
380            self.menuExport.setText('&Export to '+pref.getHDRdisplay()['tag'])
381            self.menuExportAll.setText('&Export All to '+pref.getHDRdisplay()['tag'])        
382
383        prefDisplays = []
384        for i,d in enumerate(displayList):
385            if d != 'none':
386                prefDisplay = QAction('&Set display to '+d, self) 
387                p_cbd = functools.partial(cbd, d)
388                prefDisplay.triggered.connect(p_cbd)
389                prefMenu.addAction(prefDisplay)

405        displayHDR.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackCompareRawEditedHDR)
406        displayHDRmenu.addAction(displayHDR)
407        # ------------------------------------

409        closeHDR.setShortcut('Ctrl+K')
410        closeHDR.setStatusTip('[Display HDR] reset HDR window')
411        closeHDR.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackCloseDisplayHDR)
412        displayHDRmenu.addAction(closeHDR)

class ImageInfoView(PyQt5.QtWidgets.QSplitter): 
459class ImageInfoView(QSplitter):
460    def __init__(self, _controller):
461        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageInfoView.__init__(",")")
462
463        super().__init__(Qt.Vertical)
464
465        self.controller = _controller
466
467        self.imageWidgetController = controller.ImageWidgetController()
468
469        self.layout = QFormLayout()
470
471        # ---------------------------------------------------
472        self.imageName =            AdvanceLineEdit(" name:", " ........ ",             self.layout, callBack=None)
473        self.imagePath =            AdvanceLineEdit(" path:", " ........ ",             self.layout, callBack=None)
474        self.imageSize =            AdvanceLineEdit(" size (pixel):", ".... x .... ",   self.layout, callBack=None)
475        self.imageDynamicRange =    AdvanceLineEdit(" dynamic range (f-stops)", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
476        self.colorSpace =           AdvanceLineEdit(" color space:", " ........ ",      self.layout, callBack=None)
477        self.imageType =            AdvanceLineEdit(" type:", " ........ ",             self.layout, callBack=None)                     
478        self.imageBPS =             AdvanceLineEdit(" bits per sample:", " ........ ",  self.layout, callBack=None)
479        self.imageExpoTime =        AdvanceLineEdit(" exposure time:", " ........ ",    self.layout, callBack=None)
480        self.imageFNumber =         AdvanceLineEdit("f-number:", " ........ ",          self.layout, callBack=None)          
481        self.imageISO =             AdvanceLineEdit(" ISO:", " ........ ",              self.layout, callBack=None)           
482        self.imageCamera =          AdvanceLineEdit(" camera:", " ........ ",           self.layout, callBack=None)      
483        self.imageSoftware =        AdvanceLineEdit(" software:", " ........ ",         self.layout, callBack=None)      
484        self.imageLens =            AdvanceLineEdit(" lens:", " ........ ",             self.layout, callBack=None)
485        self.imageFocalLength =     AdvanceLineEdit(" focal length:", " ........ ",     self.layout, callBack=None)
486        # ---------------------------------------------------
487        # ---------------------------------------------------
488        line = QFrame()
489        line.setFrameShape(QFrame.HLine)
490        self.layout.addRow(line)
491        # ---------------------------------------------------
492        #  user defined tags
493        # --------------------------------------------------
494        userDefinedTags = hdrCore.metadata.tags()
495        tagRootName = userDefinedTags.getTagsRootName()
496        listOfTags = userDefinedTags.tags[tagRootName]
497        self.userDefinedTags = []
498        for tagGroup in listOfTags:
499            groupKey = list(tagGroup.keys())[0]
500            tagLeafs = tagGroup[groupKey]
501            for tag in tagLeafs.items():
502                self.userDefinedTags.append( AdvanceCheckBox(self,groupKey, tag[0], False, self.layout))
503            line = QFrame()
504            line.setFrameShape(QFrame.HLine)
505            self.layout.addRow(line)
506        # --------------------------------------------------
507
508
509        self.layout.setSizeConstraint(QLayout.SetMinAndMaxSize)
510
511        self.scroll = QScrollArea()
512        self.scroll.setVerticalScrollBarPolicy(Qt.ScrollBarAlwaysOn)
513        self.container = QLabel()
514        self.container.setLayout(self.layout)
515        self.scroll.setWidget(self.container)
516        self.scroll.setWidgetResizable(True)
517
518        self.addWidget(self.imageWidgetController.view)
519        self.addWidget(self.scroll)
520        self.setSizes([60,40])
521
522    def setProcessPipe(self,processPipe): 
523        image_ = processPipe.getImage()
524        # ---------------------------------------------------
525        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageInfoView.setImage(",image_.name,")")
526        if image_.metadata.metadata['filename'] != None: self.imageName.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['filename'])
527        else: self.imageName.setText(" ........ ")
528        if image_.metadata.metadata['path'] != None: self.imagePath.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['path'])
529        else: self.imagePath.setText(" ........ ")
530        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Image Width'] != None: self.imageSize.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Image Width'])+" x "+ str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Image Height']))
531        else: self.imageSize.setText(" ........ ")
532        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Dynamic Range (stops)'] != None: self.imageDynamicRange.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Dynamic Range (stops)']))
533        else: self.imageDynamicRange.setText(" ........ ")
534        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Color Space'] != None: self.colorSpace.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Color Space'])
535        else: self.imageName.setText(" ........ ")
536        if image_.type != None: self.imageType.setText(str(image_.type))       
537        else: self.colorSpace.setText(" ........ ")
538        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Bits Per Sample'] != None: self.imageBPS.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Bits Per Sample']))
539        else: self.imageBPS.setText(" ........ ")
540        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Exposure Time'] != None: self.imageExpoTime.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Exposure Time'][0])+" / " + str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Exposure Time'][1]))
541        else: self.imageExpoTime.setText(" ........ ")
542        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['F Number'] != None: self.imageFNumber.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['F Number'][0]))    
543        else: self.imageFNumber.setText(" ........ ")
544        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['ISO'] != None: self.imageISO.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['ISO']))       
545        else: self.imageISO.setText(" ........ ")
546        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Camera'] != None: self.imageCamera.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Camera'])      
547        else: self.imageCamera.setText(" ........ ")
548        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Software'] != None: self.imageSoftware.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Software'])      
549        else: self.imageSoftware.setText(" ........ ")
550        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Lens'] != None: self.imageLens.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Lens'])
551        else: self.imageLens.setText(" ........ ")
552        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Focal Length'] != None: self.imageFocalLength.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Focal Length'][0]))
553        else: self.imageFocalLength.setText(" ........ ")
554        # ---------------------------------------------------
555        self.controller.callBackActive = False
556        # ---------------------------------------------------
557        tagRootName = image_.metadata.otherTags.getTagsRootName()
558        listOfTags = image_.metadata.metadata[tagRootName]
559
560        for i,tagGroup in enumerate(listOfTags):
561            groupKey = list(tagGroup.keys())[0]
562            tagLeafs = tagGroup[groupKey]
563            for tag in tagLeafs.items():
564                # find advanced checkbox
565                for acb in self.userDefinedTags:
566                    if (acb.rightText ==tag[0] ) and (acb.leftText== groupKey):
567                        on_off = image_.metadata.metadata[tagRootName][i][groupKey][tag[0]]
568                        on_off = on_off if on_off else False
569                        acb.setState(on_off)
570                        break  
571        # ---------------------------------------------------        
572        self.controller.callBackActive = True
573        # ---------------------------------------------------
574        return self.imageWidgetController.setImage(image_)
575
576    def metadataChange(self,metaGroup,metaTag, on_off): 
577        if self.controller.callBackActive: self.controller.metadataChange(metaGroup,metaTag, on_off)

def setProcessPipe(self, processPipe): 
522    def setProcessPipe(self,processPipe): 
523        image_ = processPipe.getImage()
524        # ---------------------------------------------------
525        if pref.verbose: print(" [VIEW] >> ImageInfoView.setImage(",image_.name,")")
526        if image_.metadata.metadata['filename'] != None: self.imageName.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['filename'])
527        else: self.imageName.setText(" ........ ")
528        if image_.metadata.metadata['path'] != None: self.imagePath.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['path'])
529        else: self.imagePath.setText(" ........ ")
530        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Image Width'] != None: self.imageSize.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Image Width'])+" x "+ str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Image Height']))
531        else: self.imageSize.setText(" ........ ")
532        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Dynamic Range (stops)'] != None: self.imageDynamicRange.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Dynamic Range (stops)']))
533        else: self.imageDynamicRange.setText(" ........ ")
534        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Color Space'] != None: self.colorSpace.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Color Space'])
535        else: self.imageName.setText(" ........ ")
536        if image_.type != None: self.imageType.setText(str(image_.type))       
537        else: self.colorSpace.setText(" ........ ")
538        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Bits Per Sample'] != None: self.imageBPS.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Bits Per Sample']))
539        else: self.imageBPS.setText(" ........ ")
540        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Exposure Time'] != None: self.imageExpoTime.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Exposure Time'][0])+" / " + str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Exposure Time'][1]))
541        else: self.imageExpoTime.setText(" ........ ")
542        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['F Number'] != None: self.imageFNumber.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['F Number'][0]))    
543        else: self.imageFNumber.setText(" ........ ")
544        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['ISO'] != None: self.imageISO.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['ISO']))       
545        else: self.imageISO.setText(" ........ ")
546        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Camera'] != None: self.imageCamera.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Camera'])      
547        else: self.imageCamera.setText(" ........ ")
548        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Software'] != None: self.imageSoftware.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Software'])      
549        else: self.imageSoftware.setText(" ........ ")
550        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Lens'] != None: self.imageLens.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Lens'])
551        else: self.imageLens.setText(" ........ ")
552        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Focal Length'] != None: self.imageFocalLength.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Focal Length'][0]))
553        else: self.imageFocalLength.setText(" ........ ")
554        # ---------------------------------------------------
555        self.controller.callBackActive = False
556        # ---------------------------------------------------
557        tagRootName = image_.metadata.otherTags.getTagsRootName()
558        listOfTags = image_.metadata.metadata[tagRootName]
559
560        for i,tagGroup in enumerate(listOfTags):
561            groupKey = list(tagGroup.keys())[0]
562            tagLeafs = tagGroup[groupKey]
563            for tag in tagLeafs.items():
564                # find advanced checkbox
565                for acb in self.userDefinedTags:
566                    if (acb.rightText ==tag[0] ) and (acb.leftText== groupKey):
567                        on_off = image_.metadata.metadata[tagRootName][i][groupKey][tag[0]]
568                        on_off = on_off if on_off else False
569                        acb.setState(on_off)
570                        break  
571        # ---------------------------------------------------        
572        self.controller.callBackActive = True
573        # ---------------------------------------------------
574        return self.imageWidgetController.setImage(image_)

577        if self.controller.callBackActive: self.controller.metadataChange(metaGroup,metaTag, on_off)

743    def setProcessPipe(self, processPipe):
744        """ 
745            called to initialize EditImageView on image change
746            recover parameters of processPipe
747            and initialize view components
748        """
749        if pref.verbose:  print(" [VIEW] >> EditImageView.setProcessPipe(",")")
750
751        # exposure
752        # recover value in pipe and restore it
753        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("exposure")
754        value = processPipe.getParameters(id)
755        self.exposure.setValue(value['EV'], callBackActive = False)
756
757        # contrast
758        # recover value in pipe and restore it
759        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("contrast")
760        value = processPipe.getParameters(id)
761        self.contrast.setValue(value['contrast'], callBackActive = False)
762
763        # tonecurve
764        # recover data in pipe and restore it
765        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("tonecurve")
766        value = processPipe.getParameters(id)
767        self.tonecurve.setValues(value,callBackActive = False)
768
769        # lightnessmask
770        # recover data in pipe and restore it
771        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("lightnessmask")
772        value = processPipe.getParameters(id)
773        self.lightnessmask.setValues(value,callBackActive = False)
774
775        # saturation
776        # recover data in pipe and restore it
777        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("saturation")
778        value = processPipe.getParameters(id)
779        self.saturation.setValue(value['saturation'], callBackActive = False)
780
781        # colorEditor0
782        # recover data in pipe and restore it
783        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("colorEditor0")
784        values = processPipe.getParameters(id)
785        self.colorEditor0.setValues(values, callBackActive = False)
786
787        # colorEditor1
788        # recover data in pipe and restore it
789        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("colorEditor1")
790        values = processPipe.getParameters(id)
791        self.colorEditor1.setValues(values, callBackActive = False)
792
793        # colorEditor2
794        # recover data in pipe and restore it
795        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("colorEditor2")
796        values = processPipe.getParameters(id)
797        self.colorEditor2.setValues(values, callBackActive = False)
798
799        # colorEditor3
800        # recover data in pipe and restore it
801        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("colorEditor3")
802        values = processPipe.getParameters(id)
803        self.colorEditor3.setValues(values, callBackActive = False)
804        
805        # colorEditor4
806        # recover data in pipe and restore it
807        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("colorEditor4")
808        values = processPipe.getParameters(id)
809        self.colorEditor4.setValues(values, callBackActive = False)
810        
811        # geometry
812        # recover data in pipe and restore it
813        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("geometry")
814        values = processPipe.getParameters(id)
815        self.geometry.setValues(values, callBackActive = False)

class MultiDockView(PyQt5.QtWidgets.QDockWidget): 
819class MultiDockView(QDockWidget):
820    def __init__(self, _controller, HDRcontroller=None):
821        if pref.verbose:  print(" [VIEW] >> MultiDockView.__init__(",")")
822
823        super().__init__("Image Edit/Info")
824        self.controller = _controller
825
826        self.setAllowedAreas(Qt.LeftDockWidgetArea | Qt.RightDockWidgetArea)
827      
828        self.childControllers = [
829            controller.EditImageController(self, HDRcontroller), 
830            controller.ImageInfoController(self), 
831            controller.ImageAestheticsController(self)]
832            #controller.ImageQualityController(self, HDRcontroller)]
833        self.childController = self.childControllers[0]
834        self.active = 0
835        self.setWidget(self.childController.view)
836        self.repaint()
837    # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
838    def switch(self,nb):
839        """
840            change active dock
841            nb = 0 > editing imag dock
842            nb = 1 > image info and metadata dock
843            nb = 2 > image aesthetics model 
844        """
845        if pref.verbose:  print(" [VIEW] >> MultiDockView.switch(",nb,")")
846
847        if nb != self.active:
848     
849            self.active = (nb)%len(self.childControllers)
850            self.childController.view.deleteLater()
851            self.childController = self.childControllers[self.active]
852            # rebuild view 
853            processPipe = self.controller.parent.imageGalleryController.getSelectedProcessPipe()
854            self.childController.buildView(processPipe)
855            self.setWidget(self.childController.view)
856            self.repaint()
857    # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
858    def setProcessPipe(self, processPipe):
859        if pref.verbose:  print(" [VIEW] >> MultiDockView.setProcessPipe(",processPipe.getImage().name,")")
860        return self.childController.setProcessPipe(processPipe)

QDockWidget(title: Optional[str], parent: Optional[QWidget] = None, flags: Union[Qt.WindowFlags, Qt.WindowType] = Qt.WindowFlags()) QDockWidget(parent: Optional[QWidget] = None, flags: Union[Qt.WindowFlags, Qt.WindowType] = Qt.WindowFlags())

MultiDockView(_controller, HDRcontroller=None) 
820    def __init__(self, _controller, HDRcontroller=None):
821        if pref.verbose:  print(" [VIEW] >> MultiDockView.__init__(",")")
822
823        super().__init__("Image Edit/Info")
824        self.controller = _controller
825
826        self.setAllowedAreas(Qt.LeftDockWidgetArea | Qt.RightDockWidgetArea)
827      
828        self.childControllers = [
829            controller.EditImageController(self, HDRcontroller), 
830            controller.ImageInfoController(self), 
831            controller.ImageAestheticsController(self)]
832            #controller.ImageQualityController(self, HDRcontroller)]
833        self.childController = self.childControllers[0]
834        self.active = 0
835        self.setWidget(self.childController.view)
836        self.repaint()

def switch(self, nb): 
838    def switch(self,nb):
839        """
840            change active dock
841            nb = 0 > editing imag dock
842            nb = 1 > image info and metadata dock
843            nb = 2 > image aesthetics model 
844        """
845        if pref.verbose:  print(" [VIEW] >> MultiDockView.switch(",nb,")")
846
847        if nb != self.active:
848     
849            self.active = (nb)%len(self.childControllers)
850            self.childController.view.deleteLater()
851            self.childController = self.childControllers[self.active]
852            # rebuild view 
853            processPipe = self.controller.parent.imageGalleryController.getSelectedProcessPipe()
854            self.childController.buildView(processPipe)
855            self.setWidget(self.childController.view)
856            self.repaint()

change active dock nb = 0 > editing imag dock nb = 1 > image info and metadata dock nb = 2 > image aesthetics model

def setProcessPipe(self, processPipe): 
858    def setProcessPipe(self, processPipe):
859        if pref.verbose:  print(" [VIEW] >> MultiDockView.setProcessPipe(",processPipe.getImage().name,")")
860        return self.childController.setProcessPipe(processPipe)

875

877

879        self.auto = QPushButton("auto")

881        self.editValue.setValidator(QDoubleValidator())
882        self.editValue.setText(str(defaultValue))
883        self.reset = QPushButton("reset")
884

888        self.hbox.addWidget(self.reset)

891        self.slider.setRange(int(range[0]/step),int(range[1]/step))

893        self.slider.setSingleStep(1)

901        self.slider.valueChanged.connect(self.controller.sliderChange)
902        self.reset.clicked.connect(self.controller.reset)
903        self.auto.clicked.connect(self.controller.auto)

1377    # callbacks
1378    def sliderHueChange(self):
1379        hmin = self.sliderHueMin.value()
1380        hmax = self.sliderHueMax.value()
1381
1382        # redraw hue range and chroma bar
1383        hueRangeBarLch = hdrCore.image.Image.buildLchColorData((75,75), (100,100), (hmin,hmax), (20,720), width='h', height='c')
1384        hueRangeBarRGB = hdrCore.processing.Lch_to_sRGB(hueRangeBarLch,apply_cctf_encoding=True, clip=True)
1385        self.imageHueRangeController.setImage(hueRangeBarRGB)
1386        saturationBarLch = hdrCore.image.Image.buildLchColorData((75,75), (0,100), (hmin,hmax), (20,720), width='c', height='L')
1387        saturationBarRGB = hdrCore.processing.Lch_to_sRGB(saturationBarLch,apply_cctf_encoding=True, clip=True)
1388        self.imageSaturationController.setImage(saturationBarRGB)
1389
1390        # call controller
1391        self.controller.sliderHueChange(hmin,hmax)
1392
1393    def sliderChromaChange(self):
1394        vmin = self.sliderChromaMin.value()
1395        vmax = self.sliderChromaMax.value()
1396        # call controller
1397        self.controller.sliderChromaChange(vmin,vmax)
1398
1399    def sliderLightnessChange(self):
1400        vmin = self.sliderLightMin.value()/3.0
1401        vmax = self.sliderLightMax.value()/3.0
1402        # call controller
1403        self.controller.sliderLightnessChange(vmin,vmax)
1404
1405    def sliderExposureChange(self):
1406        ev = round(self.sliderExposure.value()/30,1)
1407        # force to 0.1 precision
1408        self.valueExposure.setText(str(ev))
1409        self.controller.sliderExposureChange(ev)
1410
1411    def sliderSaturationChange(self):
1412        ev = self.sliderSaturation.value()
1413        self.valueSaturation.setText(str(ev))
1414        self.controller.sliderSaturationChange(ev)
1415
1416    def sliderContrastChange(self):
1417        ev = self.sliderContrast.value()
1418        self.valueContrast.setText(str(ev))
1419        self.controller.sliderContrastChange(ev)
1420
1421    def sliderHueShiftChange(self):
1422        hs = self.sliderHueShift.value()
1423        self.valueHueShift.setText(str(hs))
1424        self.controller.sliderHueShiftChange(hs)
1425
1426    def checkboxMaskChange(self):
1427        self.controller.checkboxMaskChange(self.checkboxMask.isChecked())

def sliderHueChange(self): 
1378    def sliderHueChange(self):
1379        hmin = self.sliderHueMin.value()
1380        hmax = self.sliderHueMax.value()
1381
1382        # redraw hue range and chroma bar
1383        hueRangeBarLch = hdrCore.image.Image.buildLchColorData((75,75), (100,100), (hmin,hmax), (20,720), width='h', height='c')
1384        hueRangeBarRGB = hdrCore.processing.Lch_to_sRGB(hueRangeBarLch,apply_cctf_encoding=True, clip=True)
1385        self.imageHueRangeController.setImage(hueRangeBarRGB)
1386        saturationBarLch = hdrCore.image.Image.buildLchColorData((75,75), (0,100), (hmin,hmax), (20,720), width='c', height='L')
1387        saturationBarRGB = hdrCore.processing.Lch_to_sRGB(saturationBarLch,apply_cctf_encoding=True, clip=True)
1388        self.imageSaturationController.setImage(saturationBarRGB)
1389
1390        # call controller
1391        self.controller.sliderHueChange(hmin,hmax)
